languages.text: "Пример для демонстрации закона: пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна. По данным эксплораторского флота, базирующиеся на станции еретики допускают торговые сношения с ксеносами ради обретения опасных и тлетворных технологий. Приоритет уничтожения еретиков значителен, но не достигает отметки, предполагающей безотлагательных действий".

"An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."
languages.original_text: "Пример для демонстрации закона: пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна. По данным эксплораторского флота, базирующиеся на станции еретики допускают торговые сношения с ксеносами ради обретения опасных и тлетворных технологий. Приоритет уничтожения еретиков значителен, но не достигает отметки, предполагающей безотлагательных действий".

languages.text: 「概略のパターンを示す例を提示：ラングレンズベルトの星系にヴォイドステーションがあります。コグニサンス艦隊が保有するデータによると、ステーション内の異端者は危険かつ悪質な技術を取得するという目的のためだけに、異種族と貿易関係を築いています。これらの異端者を滅ぼすことは最優先事項とみなされますが、ただちに行動に移すほどの深刻性はありません」
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: 「概略のパターンを示す例を提示：ラングレンズベルトの星系にヴォイドステーションがあります。コグニサンス艦隊が保有するデータによると、ステーション内の異端者は危険かつ悪質な技術を取得するという目的のためだけに、異種族と貿易関係を築いています。これらの異端者を滅ぼすことは最優先事項とみなされますが、ただちに行動に移すほどの深刻性はありません」

languages.text: “模式，举例概述：朗恩之带的某个空间站。根据真理开拓者舰队获得的资料，空间站上的异端与异形存在贸易关系，其目的是获得危险和有害的技术。摧毁这些异端具有高优先级，但暂时并不需要采取立即行动。”
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: “模式，举例概述：朗恩之带的某个空间站。根据真理开拓者舰队获得的资料，空间站上的异端与异形存在贸易关系，其目的是获得危险和有害的技术。摧毁这些异端具有高优先级，但暂时并不需要采取立即行动。”

languages.text: «Un ejemplo que demuestra el patrón señalado: una estación del vacío en el sistema del Cinturón de Langrenn. Según los datos de la Flota Conciencia, los herejes de la estación mantienen relaciones comerciales con xenos para obtener tecnología peligrosa y perniciosa. La destrucción de estos herejes es prioritaria, pero no tanto como para exigir una actuación inmediata».
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: «Un ejemplo que demuestra el patrón señalado: una estación del vacío en el sistema del Cinturón de Langrenn. Según los datos de la Flota Conciencia, los herejes de la estación mantienen relaciones comerciales con xenos para obtener tecnología peligrosa y perniciosa. La destrucción de estos herejes es prioritaria, pero no tanto como para exigir una actuación inmediata».

languages.text: « Voici un exemple du comportement susmentionné : une station spatiale dans le système de la Ceinture de Langrenn. D'après les données dont dispose la Flotte de la Connaissance, les hérétiques de cette station entretiennent des relations commerciales avec des xénos dans le but d'obtenir des technologies dangereuses et néfastes. L'élimination de ces hérétiques constitue une priorité élevée, mais pas au point de réclamer une intervention immédiate. »
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: « Voici un exemple du comportement susmentionné : une station spatiale dans le système de la Ceinture de Langrenn. D'après les données dont dispose la Flotte de la Connaissance, les hérétiques de cette station entretiennent des relations commerciales avec des xénos dans le but d'obtenir des technologies dangereuses et néfastes. L'élimination de ces hérétiques constitue une priorité élevée, mais pas au point de réclamer une intervention immédiate. »

languages.text: "Ein Beispiel zur Verdeutlichung des dargestellten Musters: eine Leerenstation im System von Langrenns Gürtel. Laut der Erkenntnisflotte zur Verfügung stehenden Daten unterhalten die Ketzer auf der Station Handelsbeziehungen zu Xenos, um gefährliche und schädliche Technologie zu erhalten. Die Vernichtung dieser Ketzer hat eine hohe Priorität, aber nicht hoch genug, um ein sofortiges Eingreifen zu erfordern."
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Beispiel zur Verdeutlichung des dargestellten Musters: eine Leerenstation im System von Langrenns Gürtel. Laut der Erkenntnisflotte zur Verfügung stehenden Daten unterhalten die Ketzer auf der Station Handelsbeziehungen zu Xenos, um gefährliche und schädliche Technologie zu erhalten. Die Vernichtung dieser Ketzer hat eine hohe Priorität, aber nicht hoch genug, um ein sofortiges Eingreifen zu erfordern."

languages.text: "Ana hatları belirtilen örüntüye bir örnek: Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki bir uçsuz istasyonu. Malumat Filosu'nun elindeki verilere göre istasyondaki kâfirler, tehlikeli ve habis teknolojileri edinmek amacıyla zenolarla ticaret ilişkileri kurmuş bulunuyor. Bu kâfirlerin imha edilmesi yüksek önceliğe sahip olmakla birlikte bu öncelik, derhâl harekete geçilecek denli yüksek de değil."
languages.original_text: "An example that demonstrates the outlined pattern: a void station in the system of Langrenn's Belt. According to the data available to the Cognisance Fleet, the heretics on the station have trade relations with xenos for the sake of obtaining dangerous and pernicious technology. The destruction of these heretics is of high priority, but not high enough to demand immediate action."

traits.locale_text: "Açıklanan örüntüye bir örnek: Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki bir uçsuz istasyonu. Malumat Filosu'nun elindeki verilere göre istasyondaki kâfirler, tehlikeli ve habis teknolojileri edinmek amacıyla zenolarla ticaret ilişkileri kurmuşlar. Bu kâfirlerin yok edilmesi yüksek önceliğe sahip fakat bu öncelik, derhâl harekete geçilecek kadar yüksek değil."
